cat.albirar.communications.providers.sms

Interface ISmsSenderProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IServiceProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClickAndSendSmsSenderProvider

    @Validated
public interface ISmsSenderProvider
extends IServiceProvider
    The contract for SMS sender provider.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Octavi Fornés <ofornes@albirar.cat>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sendSms(@NotBlank String messageId, @NotNull @Valid ContactBean from, @NotNull @Valid ContactBean recipient, @NotBlank String message)
      Send a SMS message to a recipient number.

      • Methods inherited from interface cat.albirar.communications.providers.IServiceProvider

        getName

    • Method Detail

      • sendSms

        void sendSms(@NotBlank
             @NotBlank String messageId,
             @NotNull @Valid
             @NotNull @Valid ContactBean from,
             @NotNull @Valid
             @NotNull @Valid ContactBean recipient,
             @NotBlank
             @NotBlank String message)
        Send a SMS message to a recipient number. If no exception is raised, the message is considered send.
        Parameters:
        messageId - A unique id for this sms operation
        from - The sender number
        recipient - The recipient number
        message - The message
        Throws:
        ProviderException - If any problem sending the message was produced
        IllegalArgumentException - If from or recipient or both, are not of ECommunicationChannelType.SMS type
